gurmukhi: ਚਰਨ ਕਮਲ ਕੇ ਮਹਾਤਮ ਅਗਾਧਿ ਬੋਧਿ ਅਤਿ ਅਸਚਰਜ ਮੈ ਨਮੋ ਨਮੋ ਨਮ ਹੈ
transliteration: Charan Kamal Kay Mahaatam Agaadhi Bodhi , Ati Asacharaj Mai Namo Namo Nam Hai ?
translation: The praise of the lotus feet of Satguru Ii is comprehension. It is indeed wonderful. Salutations time and again.

gurmukhi: ਕੋਮਲ ਕੋਮਲਤਾ ਅੳੁ ਸੀਤਲ ਸੀਤਲਤਾ ਕੈ ਬਾਸਨਾ ਸੁਬਾਸੁ ਤਾਸੁ ਦੁਤੀਅਾ ਨ ਸਮ ਹੈ
transliteration: Komal Komalataa Au Seetal Seetalataa Kai , Baasanaa Soubaasu Taasu Douteeaa N Sam Hai ?
translation: They are tender than the tenderness of the whole world. They are indeed comfortably cool. No other fragrance matches them.

gurmukhi: ਸਹਜ ਸਮਾਧਿ ਨਿਜ ਅਾਸਨ ਸਿੰਘਾਸਨ ਸ੍ਵਾਦ ਬਿਸਮਾਦ ਰਸ ਗੰਮਿਤ ਅਗਮ ਹੈ
transliteration: Sahaj Samaadhi Nij Aasan Singhaasana , Svaad Bisamaad Ras Ganmit Agam Hai ?
translation: The disciple, who lives ever in attendance of the holy feet of the True Satguru Ii and has worked hard on meditation of Lord's name, has relished the supernatural elixir of Naam Simran.

gurmukhi: ਰੂਪ ਕੈ ਅਨੂਪ ਰੂਪ ਮਨ ਮਨਸਾ ਬਕਤ ਅਕਥ ਕਥਾ ਬਿਨੋਦ ਬਿਸਮੈ ਬਿਸਮ ਹੈ ||੮੦||
transliteration: Roop Kai Anoop Roop Man Manasaa Bakata , Akad Kadaa Binod Bisamai Bisam Hai ?80?
translation: The beauty of Satguru's lotus feet is exemplary. The desire and faculty of mind tires describing it. Their praise indescribable. This wonder of wonders is astonishing. (80)
